title: 2021 Week 7 Preview - Spirit Day
itunes:title: 2021 Week 7 Preview - Spirit Day
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview each upcoming game of Week 7 starting with a jump right out the gate. It's Spirit Day and the heroes talk about what that means to them. Marc Sessler is in a mood today, and it's glorious.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
